steps.name: Requirements Gathering
steps.action: Gathering all the requirements from the stakeholders.

steps.name: Design
steps.action: Creating a design for the website in Figma.

steps.name: Development Phase 1: Frontend Development
steps.action: Writing HTML, CSS and JS code for the frontend of the website.

steps.name: Development Phase 2: Backend Development
steps.action: Setting up server, database and APIs for the backend of the website.

steps.name: Development Phase 3: Deployment
steps.action: Deploying the website on a hosting platform.
